assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Solekia Limited provides technological solutions for various business fields in Japan and internationally. The company develops and sells semiconductors, other component devices, network storage equipment, and value-added products and services; provides service integration business solutions in consulting, construction, operation, and maintenance; ICT solutions, including ERP, BCP, environment, and energy-saving; and IT infrastructure design, construction, system monitoring, help desk, BCP drafting, and disaster recovery services. It also sells PCs for companies, various servers, networking equipment, etc.; various electronic devices and components; and RFID, sensor devices, smart grid, and related products, as well as various components, ASIC, and general-purpose LSIs. In addition, the company provides business, networking, system, and LSI design consultation services; and develops business applications, control systems, communication software, embedded software, cloud systems, and firmware. Further, it offers application management services, such as web service, legacy migration, maintenance, and training; SI solutions comprising SCM, CRM, ERP, global accounting system, etc.; network solution services that include secure network and VPN; outsourcing services, which comprise help desk, housing, and hosting; and data center and IDC services. Additionally, the company provides field services, including maintenance, infrastructure construction, operative, security, kitting, and data backup and recovery. It primarily serves government municipal offices, local government authorities, agricultural cooperatives, and consumers' cooperative associations, as well as financial, healthcare, manufacturing, distribution, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Kobayashi Denshi Sangyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Solekia Limited in April 2002. Solekia Limited was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
